text: Seek a calling. Even if you don’t know what that means, seek it. If you’re following your calling, the fatigue will be easier to bear, the disappointments will be fuel, the highs will be like nothing you’ve ever felt.
author: Phil Knight
source: Shoe Dog: A Memoir by the Creator of Nike

text: Everybody is looking for the right person, and nobody is trying to be the right person.
We judge others by their actions and ourselves on our intentions.
